description:
From the collection inspired by the spectacular freeski film “La Liste” featuring MAMMUT Pro Team Athlete Jérémie Heitz. A fully-equipped hardshell jacket for freeriding. Robust and
completely waterproof 3-layer GORE-TEX® Pro material. Outstanding breathability. Functions optimized for skiing ensure greater safety and comfort. In a casual freerider look.
name: Mammut La Liste Pro HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
